mapper.insert: insert into NOTIFICATIONS (GROUP_ID, NOTIFICATION_ID, MESSAGE, NOTIFICATION_DATE) values (#{groupId}, (select n.NOTIFICATION_ID + 1 FROM NOTIFICATIONS n where GROUP_ID = #{groupId} ORDER BY n.NOTIFICATION_ID DESC LIMIT 1), #{message}, now());
insert into NOTIFICATIONS (GROUP_ID, NOTIFICATION_ID, MESSAGE, NOTIFICATION_DATE) values (#{groupId}, 1, #{message}, now());
